rules_text: Create a token that is a copy of target creature you control, except it has haste and “At the beginning of the next end step, exile this permanent.” Then draw a card if you control a Knight, Soldier, or Warrior.
flavor_text:
[i]“I care not for the Pieces of the God. I just care on where I need to swing my blade.”
—Sinder, the White Blade[/i]
